channel.title: Error
channel.description:
Ok, I downloaded Richscape's latest client and I went to compile and run and I got this error...
[code]:: Port: :: 43594 :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_05... 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. :: Failed! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I downloaded jdk 1.6.0_07 but I get this error. I don't know what to do. I have the latest version of java. I also did the variable stuff.

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Sp3cster Sp3cster
item.description:
@Sp3cster wrote:

I tried the forums and google, but I can’t find anything. Link please?
